## Import data
```{r data import}
# Import data
survey = readxl::read_excel("./data/WIM COVID 19 Data.xlsx")
survey = survey[-1,]
```

## Q1
```{r Q1}
survey$Q1 = as.numeric(survey$Q1)
wilcox.test(survey$Q1, mu = 1)
```
